articles.author: Max Colchester
articles.title: U.K.’s Boris Johnson Resigns, but Will Remain Prime Minister Until Successor Is Found
articles.description: Boris Johnson said that he would step down as British prime minister, following a wide-scale rebellion in his party, capping an astonishing fall from grace for a politician who once looked poised to dominate U.K. politics for years.
articles.content: LONDONBoris Johnson said Thursday that he would step down as British prime minister, following a wide-scale rebellion in his party, capping an astonishing fall from grace for a politician who once lo… [+381 chars]

articles.title: Georgia Guidestones blown up: Early-morning explosion damages controversial monument
articles.description: Dubbed "America's Stonehenge," the Georgia Guidestones bears a 10-part message in eight different languages with guidance for living in an "age of reason."
articles.content: A rural Georgia monument that some conservative Christians have criticized as satanic and that others have dubbed "America's Stonehenge" was bombed before dawn on Wednesday in an attack that turned o… [+4856 chars]

articles.title: Heads of MI5, FBI give joint warning of growing threat from China
articles.description: The heads of MI5 and FBI warned of the growing long-term threat posed by China to UK and U.S. interests, in their first joint appearance on Wednesday.
articles.content:
July 6 (Reuters) - The heads of MI5 and FBI warned of the growing long-term threat posed by China to UK and U.S. interests, in their first joint appearance on Wednesday.

articles.title: Alaska Kills 4 Bears That Entered Campground
articles.description: The bears had been rummaging through tents at a park managed by the city of Anchorage. No one was injured, according to a city spokesman.

articles.title: Brittney Griner back in Russian court as fear of conviction looms
articles.description: Russia's Foreign Ministry said Wednesday that Brittney Griner will have an opportunity to appeal her verdict or apply for clemency once the ruling is official.
